briefTitle: A Safety and Efficacy Study of Naltrexone SR/Bupropion SR in Overweight and Obese Subjects
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double Blind, Placebo Controlled Study Comparing the Safety and Efficacy of Naltrexone Sustained Release (SR)/Bupropion Sustained Release (SR) and Placebo in Obese Subjects
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the combination of naltrexone SR and bupropion SR is safe and effective in the treatment of obesity.

primaryOutcome.measure: Co-primary: Body Weight- Mean Percent Change From Baseline to Week 28
